title: Album, Cahier de Bijouteries dans le goût moderne comme boîtes, pommes de cannes, bagues, cachets, boucles d'oreilles &c, dessinés et gravés par Fay (Album of Jewelry in the Modern Taste, Such as Cane Heads, Seals, Earrings, etc., Drawn and Engraved By Fay), ca. 1780
title_raw: Cahier de Bijouteries dans le goût moderne comme boîtes, pommes de cannes, bagues, cachets, boucles d'oreilles &c, dessinés et gravés par Fay (Album of Jewelry in the Modern Taste, Such as Cane Heads, Seals, Earrings, etc., Drawn and Engraved By Fay)
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph: Album, Cahier de Bijouteries dans le goût moderne comme boîtes, pommes de cannes, bagues, cachets, boucles d'oreilles &c, dessinés et gravés par Fay (Album of Jewelry in the Modern Taste, Such as Cane Heads, Seals, Earrings, etc., Drawn and Engraved By Fay), ca. 1780. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-304.
